TopicTitle: Landing legs spawn in floor of VAB

Articles.Content:
I was building in the VAB and when I tried to put on some landing legs, at first it seemed like I couldn't grab them from the parts menu. Then I realized they were actually spawning in the floor of the VAB every time I clicked them, with a solid texture as if attached. I could grab them from there and attach them to my build and move them around but only with 1x symmetry. if I tried with any other symmetry they wouldn't attach but strangely leave a silhouette imprint on the parent part wherever I moved them over it, resulting in tens of "unattached" landing legs covering my whole craft. The same thing happened no mater what type of landing legs I tried to use. There was nothing wrong with the landing gear or any other parts that I could tell. Only the landing legs.

Has anyone seen this before or have any idea why this could be happening?

Edited August 12, 2015 by A_name
I've never seen it, but you may want to backup saves and re-install. That fixes lots of stuff, unless it's mod-related.
sounds like this issue with autobalancinglandingleg

sounds like this issue with autobalancinglandingleg

This is it exactly. Thank you!
